page.title: 18FARMING (3)
page.content: the other.They lost 5 acres of land when the link road went through the farm.But Mr Britton bought 4 more acres of land,so they are only one acre short now.On the other side of the link road there are 80 acres of land. The farmer takes the{baby pigs}to the Taunton slaughter house Tuesday. He takes the{lambs}to Lloyd Maunders in Willand any day.Mr Britton used to have 1000{hens}but now he only has 100. The{hens}always have food nearby. They get about 90 eggs a week.They go to a small egg depot in Willand. They have got 120{pigs.}They get fed twice a day.They have 170{cattle.}They get milked twice a day.They have 6 {cows}in the milking shed at a time.It takes one and a half hours to milk all the{cows}.The milk is collected every morning.The{cows }are for beef and
